autoIcefill.name: Auto Icefill
autoIcefill.description: Automatically does the ice fill puzzle in dungeons

autoReady.name: Auto Ready
autoReady.description: Automatically clicks in the ready GUI

autoMort.name: Auto Mort
autoMort.description: Automatically gets in range of mort and opens his GUI

autoUlt.name: Auto Ult
autoUlt.description: Automatically uses class ultimate on certain times

autoShield.name: Auto Shield
autoShield.description: Automatically uses wither shield when not full hp and in boss

autoWish.name: Auto Wish
autoWish.description: Automatically uses wish when a temmate is low HP

autoMask.name: Auto Mask
autoMask.description: Automatically swaps between bonzo and spirit mask

autoLeap.name: Auto Leap
autoLeap.description: Automatically leaps to a player when writing !tp in party chat

bloodTriggerBot.name: Blood triggerbot
bloodTriggerBot.description: Instantly clicks if you are looking at a blood mob when it spawns

bearTriggerBot.name: Spirit Bear TB
bearTriggerBot.description: Instantly clicks if you are looking at a spirit bear when it spawns

superBoom.name: Superboom
superBoom.description: Uses superboom if you click on a crypt or boom-able wall

partyCmds.name: Party Cmds
partyCmds.description: Custom party commands use !help in party chat

guildCmds.name: Guild Cmds
guildCmds.description: Custom guild commands use !help in guild chat

guildGM.name: Guild GM
guildGM.description: Responds to anyone in guild chat saying gm/gn

autoSell.name: Auto Sell
autoSell.description: Automatically sells items in the trades GUI, /autosell to configure

flareTimer.name: Flare Timer
flareTimer.description: Shows a timer and the type of the flare around you /moveflare

kuudraAlerts.name: Kuudra Alerts
kuudraAlerts.description: Shows messages on screen on specific events in kuudra

esp.name: ESP
esp.description: You can add whatever mob you want into the list /esp

relicAura.name: Relic Aura
relicAura.description: Automatically picks up relics when you are within 5 blocks of them

dragonBoxes.name: Dragon Boxes
dragonBoxes.description: Creates custom and decently accurate boxes in p5

dragonTimer.name: Dragon Timer
dragonTimer.description: Shows when a M7 dragon will spawn

fuckDiorite.name: FUCK DIORITE
fuckDiorite.description: Replaces diorite with glass in p2 (don't use connected blocks)

preGhostBlock.name: Pre Ghostblock
preGhostBlock.description: Makes ghost blocks and covinient spots in the m7 boss

m7Sounds.name: Custom M7 Music
m7Sounds.description: Open the song.js file for instructions its wip if u dont know how to, then its not for you atm

brokenHype.name: Broken Hype
brokenHype.description: Automatically alerts when your hype is broken

vanqNotifier.name: Vanq Notifier
vanqNotifier.description: Automatically sends a message in party chat and makes a beacon whenever odinclient/patcher sends coords in party chat

terminatorAC.name: Terminator AC
terminatorAC.description: Spams right click while term is held, ranomized cps

cookieClicker.name: Cookie Clicker
cookieClicker.description: Spams the cookie while in the cookie clicker menu
